Instance.description: Situation Goal for a change in a lot's tile count.

TunableTuple.name: tile_count_threshold
TunableTuple.description: The threshold difference for a change in a lot's tile count. NOTE: This check will be skipped if the home's lot type is anything other than a regular lot (an apartment for example). It will also be skipped if the lot's minimum or maximum tile count has already been reached. This allows players who are already in either state to pass the test.

TunableEnum.name: comparison
TunableEnum.description: The comparison to perform against the value.
